outline:
1. to be bright, be beautiful, be handsome, be fair
    1. (Qal) to be beautiful
    2. (Piel) to beautify
    3. (Pual) to be beautiful
    4. (Hithpael) to beautify oneself
kjv_def: be beautiful, be (make self) fair(-r), deck.
strongs_def: properly, to be bright, i.e. (by implication) beautiful
